verses.kjv: Lord, I cry unto thee: make haste unto me; give ear unto my voice, when I cry unto thee.
verses.ct: LORD, I'm calling out to you — please come quickly! Listen to my voice as I cry to you.

verses.kjv: Let my prayer be set forth before thee as incense; and the lifting up of my hands as the evening sacrifice.
verses.ct: Let my prayer rise into your presence like incense, and let my raised hands be like an evening offering.

verses.kjv: Set a watch, O LORD, before my mouth; keep the door of my lips.
verses.ct: LORD, place a guard over my mouth; keep watch over the door of my lips.

verses.kjv: Incline not my heart to any evil thing, to practise wicked works with men that work iniquity: and let me not eat of their dainties.
verses.ct: Don't let my heart be drawn toward anything evil or let me join in wicked deeds with those who do wrong. Don't let me enjoy their luxuries.

verses.kjv: Let the righteous smite me; it shall be a kindness: and let him reprove me; it shall be an excellent oil, which shall not break my head: for yet my prayer also shall be in their calamities.
verses.ct: If a righteous person strikes me, that is an act of kindness. If they correct me, it's like fine oil on my head — I won't refuse it. Yet I will continue to pray even during their times of trouble.

verses.kjv: When their judges are overthrown in stony places, they shall hear my words; for they are sweet.
verses.ct: When their leaders are thrown down among the rocks, they will hear my words and find them pleasant.

verses.kjv: Our bones are scattered at the grave’s mouth, as when one cutteth and cleaveth wood upon the earth.
verses.ct: Like someone splitting and chopping wood on the ground, our bones have been scattered at the edge of the grave.

verses.kjv: But mine eyes are unto thee, O GOD the Lord: in thee is my trust; leave not my soul destitute.
verses.ct: But my eyes are fixed on you, GOD the Lord. You are my refuge — don't leave my soul abandoned.

verses.kjv: Keep me from the snares which they have laid for me, and the gins of the workers of iniquity.
verses.ct: Protect me from the traps they have set for me, from the snares of those who practice evil.

verses.kjv: Let the wicked fall into their own nets, whilst that I withal escape.
verses.ct: Let the wicked fall into their own nets, while I pass by safely.
